module: Module-level comment: This module implements a 512x128-bit SRAM with byte-enable functionality using four Xilinx RAMB16BWER primitives for Spartan-6 FPGAs. It provides a 128-bit data interface with 512 addressable locations, supporting byte-level write operations. The module uses parameterized initialization values and combines four 32-bit wide RAMB16BWER blocks to create the full 128-bit wide memory, with individual write enable signals for each byte.
